name: Hovercraft Drive
description: Casual hovercraft driving experience with three sprawling environment: Hills, Dunes and Tundra.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0
